methods.name: public Builder setSourceType(@SourceType int sourceType)
methods.comment: Sets where the media item came from.

methods.name: public Builder addDataType(@DataType long dataType)
methods.comment: Adds an additional data type represented as part of the media item.

methods.name: public Builder setDurationMillis(long durationMillis)
methods.comment: Sets the duration of the media item, in milliseconds.

methods.name: public Builder setClipDurationMillis(long clipDurationMillis)
methods.comment: Sets the duration of the clip taken from the media item, in milliseconds.

methods.name: public Builder setContainerMimeType(@NonNull String containerMimeType)
methods.comment: Sets the MIME type of the media container.

methods.name: public Builder addSampleMimeType(@NonNull String mimeType)
methods.comment: Adds a sample MIME type stored in the media container.

methods.name: public Builder addCodecName(@NonNull String codecName)
methods.comment:
* Adds an {@linkplain MediaCodec#getName() media codec name} that was used as part of
         * decoding/encoding this media item.

methods.name: public Builder setAudioSampleRateHz(@IntRange(from = 0) int audioSampleRateHz)
methods.comment: Sets the sample rate of audio, in Hertz.

methods.name: public Builder setAudioChannelCount(@IntRange(from = 0) int audioChannelCount)
methods.comment: Sets the number of audio channels.

methods.name: public Builder setAudioSampleCount(@IntRange(from = 0) long audioSampleCount)
methods.comment: Sets the number of audio frames in the item, after clipping (if applicable).

methods.name: public Builder setVideoSize(@NonNull Size videoSize)
methods.comment: Sets the video size, in pixels.

methods.name: public Builder setVideoDataSpace(int videoDataSpace)
methods.comment:
* Sets the {@link DataSpace} of video frames.
         *
         * @param videoDataSpace The data space, returned by {@link DataSpace#pack(int, int, int)}.

methods.name: public Builder setVideoFrameRate(@FloatRange(from = 0) float videoFrameRate)
methods.comment: Sets the average video frame rate, in frames per second.

methods.name: public Builder setVideoSampleCount(@IntRange(from = 0) long videoSampleCount)
methods.comment: Sets the number of video frames, after clipping (if applicable).
